title: Provedor do Concelho
body: F. Januário Cardoso de Melo was the first, and we believe the only individual, to hold this position in Funchal, having been appointed by decree on June 21, 1834, and taking office at the Prefecture of the Province on August 16 of the same year. In 1835, the 'provedores' began to be called 'administradores do concelho'.

F. Januário Cardoso de Melo: First and only individual to hold the position of Provedor do Concelho in Funchal

1834: Appointment of F. Januário Cardoso de Melo as Provedor do Concelho
1835: Change of the denomination from 'provedores' to 'administradores do concelho'
